summary: Rimini, 1991. For more than a year, the uno bianca gang - they always use a white Fiat Uno - has plagued the area. Their crimes are violent, sometimes killing carabineri, and there's no ... See full summary »
cast: Kim Rossi Stuart|Dino Abbrescia|Dario D'Ambrosi|Claudio Botosso|Bruno Armando|Massimo De Rossi|Giorgio Crisafi|Luciano Curreli|Pietro Bontempo|Silvia De Santis|Valeria Milillo|Giovanni Anzelotti|Alessandra Arlotti|Gianni Colini Baldeschi|Salvatore Billa|Corrado Calda|Gianfranco Candia|Elio Cesari|Matteo Chioatto|Demal Cimzic|Paolo D'Agostino|Pasqualino Damiani|Stefano Eritrei|Gianfranco Fagnano|Pietro Genuardi|Roberto Ghiani|Irene Grazioli|Gabriele Martini|Marco Morellini|Evaristus Uche Ogbechie|Luciano Pasini|Lorenzo Piani|Sebastiano Rizzo|Emanuele Secci|Corrado Solari|Gippy Soprani|Alessio Tempesta
title: Uno bianca
